## Marker class

Class for a marker. This is used in keyboard navigation to save a location in the Blockly AST.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Marker 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colour](./blockly.marker.colour.md) |  | string \| null | The colour of the marker. |
|  [curNode](./blockly.marker.curnode.md) | <code>protected</code> | [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode.md) \| null | The current location of the marker. |
|  [type](./blockly.marker.type.md) |  | string | The type of the marker. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.marker.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this marker. |
|  [getCurNode()](./blockly.marker.getcurnode.md) |  | Gets the current location of the marker. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.marker.getsourceblock.md) |  | Returns the block that this marker's current node is a child of. |
|  [getSourceBlockFromNode(node)](./blockly.marker.getsourceblockfromnode.md) |  | Returns the block that the given node is a child of. |
|  [setCurNode(newNode)](./blockly.marker.setcurnode.md) |  | Set the location of the marker and call the update method. |
